<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.55</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global</value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Waypoints </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the visibility of the given waypoint in 3D HUD view (for map visibility see [[showWaypoint]]). </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> waypoint '''setWaypointVisible''' visible </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1 </name>=<value> waypoint: [[Array]] - format [[Waypoint]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2 </name>=<value> visible: [[Boolean]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[grp, 2] [[setWaypointVisible]] [[false]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code><ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>[[group]] [[player]], [[currentWaypoint]] ([[group]] [[player]])] [[setWaypointVisible]] [[false]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value>  [[waypointVisible]], [[showWaypoint]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value>

<dd class="note">This does not apply to Zeus/Curator view... so this command won't hide the Waypoint lines and icons from your view as a Zeus when units are in your EditableAddons list.
